translation.en: [Finan] For a hundred years, there was chaos in our lands.
translation.ja: この国の混乱は 100年間続いていた

translation.en: War between Saxons and Dane invaders.
translation.ja: サクソン人と デーン人の戦いは

translation.en: And war between men who wanted to be kings.
translation.ja: 王座を欲する者たちの 戦争だった

translation.en: My lord, Uhtred, son of Uhtred, born a Saxon, but raised a Dane,
translation.ja: デーン人として育った サクソン人ウートレッドが

translation.en: had brought about a fragile peace.
translation.ja: 仮初めの平和をもたらした

translation.en: But as King Edward's health faltered,
translation.ja: だが エドワード王の病気で

translation.en: trouble spread.
And while most of the country was sworn to the Saxons,
translation.ja: 多くの国が サクソンに忠誠を誓ったが

translation.en: Uhtred's land of Northumbria was not.
translation.ja: ノーサンブリアは違った

translation.en: And enemies were keen to exploit this.
Wolf!
Wolf! [grunts] Wolf!
Destroy the settlement. Leave no sign we have landed.
translation.ja: 上陸した痕跡は一切残すな

translation.en: [warrior] Anlaf, we have the spy.
Behold my child.
Behold the daughter of Anlaf.
You look ridiculous.
It is how they dress, Father. If I'm to hide amongst them, I must appear--
translation.ja: 紛れ込むには 敵と同じ格好でなければ…

translation.en: Is King Edward dead?
Not yet.
-But each breath could be his last. -Then we chose our moment.
translation.ja: 時間の問題かと ならば好機だ

translation.en: A king dies, Saxons always turn on each other.
translation.ja: 王が死ねば サクソン人は内戦を起こす

translation.en: Pass this news to all kings who hate them.
translation.ja: 敵対する王らに伝えろ

translation.en: Tell them I have crossed from Irland and wish to make allies.
translation.ja: 我らアイルランドが 同盟を結びたいと

translation.en: Return yourself to Winchester. Wait.
translation.ja: ウィンチェスターに戻れ

translation.en: Play with them.
Unleash chaos.
[guard] No. Stay back.
[soldier] Find the queen!
[Aldhelm] Lady Eadgifu,
the traitor Aelfweard has sent men to take you and Prince Edmund into protection.
translation.ja: エルフウィアドの兵が あなたと王子を連れに

translation.en: I have no wish to be a hostage.
translation.ja: 人質には ならない

translation.en: -Can we fight them? -Not without Aethelstan.
Well, surely, my guards can--
Loyalties are shifting and factions forming. It is not certain who supports us.
translation.ja: 形勢が動いて 誰が味方か分かりません

translation.en: We should flee with your son whilst we can.
[Eadgifu] I will not forgive this.
Nor forgive Aethelstan for leaving us exposed. Damn him for his absence.
translation.ja: 私たちを守るべき アゼルスタンがいないとは

translation.en: Come, Edmund. We are leaving.
translation.ja: 出るわよ エドマンド

translation.en: -[soldier 1] Where's the queen? -[soldier 2] Move! Look everywhere!
translation.ja: 女王を探せ 見つけ出せ

translation.en: -[Edmund] Mother, what's-- -[Eadgifu] Sh. Quiet.
-Wait. -[footsteps approaching]
-[Eadgifu] Pyrlig. -[Pyrlig] We got word.
translation.ja: ピヤリグ アゼルスタンは 王のために巡礼に

translation.en: Aethelstan has gone on pilgrimage to pray for his father's health.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンは 王のために巡礼に

translation.en: Then find him and tell him of his death.
translation.ja: 彼に王の死を知らせ すぐに来いと

translation.en: Then strike him, from me, for he swore to protect us.
translation.ja: 彼に王の死を知らせ すぐに来いと 私たちを守る約束よ

translation.en: [Aldhelm grunts] Come. There's no time.
[Pyrlig] Where will you go?
-To Uhtred. -The pagan?
translation.ja: ウートレッド 異教徒だ

translation.en: -[soldier] They're in here! -[Aldhelm] Go! Go!
translation.ja: いたぞ 早く行って

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Uhtred betrayed my husband.
Are we sure this is wise?
Uhtred was like a father to Aethelstan. He can be trusted.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンの 父親代わりでした

translation.en: We go to the last kingdom.
[Finan] He stood in front of the army, and he said, "Release the arrows!"
translation.ja: 兵士の前で “矢を放て”と言ったら

translation.en: And an arrow went right through his head.
[Finan] Oh, that was something.
But then, the battle for this place certainly sticks in the memory.
translation.ja: でも ここでの戦いが やはり思い出深い

translation.en: -Both times. -[Finan] Hey. Cnut.
translation.ja: ２度だ クヌートは 正統なナニだった

translation.en: He was a proper… cock!
translation.ja: クヌートは 正統なナニだった

translation.en: Then there were the horse-killers. Oh, they were deadly.
translation.ja: 馬を殺したやつらもいたな

translation.en: -What was his name? -Bloodhair.
translation.ja: 何だっけ？ 血染めの髪

translation.en: Bloodhair. And what was her name? She of the curses?
translation.ja: あの女の名前は何だった

translation.en: Do not remind me. [belches] Skade!
translation.ja: 思い出させるな スケードだ

translation.en: Now, she was moon touched.
Another one who thought she was a seer. It didn't go well for her.
translation.ja: 自分が予言者だという女が ここにも

translation.en: I am telling you, my dream was a prophecy. Three nights I have had it.
translation.ja: 私の夢は予言です ３晩も見ました

translation.en: -And what is your dream, Ingrith? -[Finan] Don't get her started, Lord.
translation.ja: どんな夢だ？ 信じちゃダメです

translation.en: -Hear my words. "Seven kings must die." -[man] Lord?
-Seven kings and-- -Ingrith!
All stand for the queen!
Queen Eadgifu.
And my most noble friend, Lord Aldhelm.
translation.ja: 気高き友アルドヘルム

translation.en: What brings you this far north?
I come seeking refuge with my son.
Edward, rightful king of these lands, has died.
translation.ja: エドワード王が亡くなった

translation.en: Then my heart grieves.
I'd hoped to reconcile.
One down, six to go.
No! I do not like it.
Northumbria recognizes the new king, Aethelstan.
translation.ja: 我々はアゼルスタンを 新王と認める

translation.en: Do not assume Aethelstan will be king.
translation.ja: そうなるとは限らない

translation.en: -Who is supporting Aelfweard? -[Aldhelm] The ealdormen of Wessex.
translation.ja: エルフウィアドの味方は？ 貴族たち

translation.en: Of course. Still claiming Aethelstan's a bastard?
Yes. Aelfweard has the wealth of Wiltunscir behind him.
translation.ja: 裕福層の援助で資金がある

translation.en: Our spies in Aegelesburg say he's there, openly recruiting mercenaries.
translation.ja: エゲレスバーグで 兵を雇ってるそうだ

translation.en: We will go to Aegelesburg and seize him before he is at full force.
translation.ja: 軍隊ができる前に 彼を止めよう

translation.en: We would prefer your guard.
translation.ja: それより ここの警備を

translation.en: My offer gives Aethelstan the time to go to Winchester to be crowned,
translation.ja: アゼルスタンの戴冠までの 時間稼ぎです

translation.en: and we avoid a clash of armies.
I swore an oath to protect Aethelstan--
And of course, you are a man of your word.
Yet your oath to swear your lands to the king remains unfulfilled.
translation.ja: 王に領地を渡す約束は まだだけど

translation.en: Your husband showed himself hostile to those of Danish blood.
translation.ja: 陛下はデーン人を敵視した

translation.en: As such, he was not the right man to unite England.
translation.ja: イングランドを 統一する王として——

translation.en: If he had been, England would be united.
[Aldhelm] But now things can be different.
Aethelstan can be the king to fulfill the Saxon dream.
translation.ja: その夢をかなえられる

translation.en: If he chooses to swear--
I swore an oath of loyalty, and it stands.
translation.ja: 私は忠誠を誓っています

translation.en: If Aelfweard is buying mercenaries, he will be looking for men from all parts.
translation.ja: 兵を買うつもりなら 国中から探しているはず

translation.en: Do you think we can still execute an ambush?
If it is for Aethelstan, then yes.
-If he does not fall asleep. -Once. I fell asleep once.
translation.ja: 寝るなよ 二度としない

translation.en: Are you certain this is better than a band of young fighters?
translation.ja: 若い兵士を送る方が いいのでは？

translation.en: I hear you do little these days but feast and hunt.
translation.ja: 最近は 食事と狩りばかりだとか

translation.en: I will not send young men to do a task I swore to do myself.
translation.ja: 自分の約束を 人にやらせません

translation.en: -[horse whinnies] -[Finan] Come on, you little…
Come on! Come on.
Osbert! What news from our borders? Do the Scots behave themselves?
translation.ja: オズバート スコット人に動きはないか？

translation.en: Yes, Father. There are rumors Wolf-Warriors landed near Derwent.
translation.ja: はい ただ オオカミ兵のうわさが

translation.en: -Wolf-Warriors? -Why are you carrying your sword?
We're riding to protect Aethelstan from his brother.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンを守りに行く

translation.en: Then I will come.
-Any fight of yours is mine. -Stay here and protect your birthright.
translation.ja: 僕も一緒に戦いたい ここで国を守れ

translation.en: No good comes of sitting waiting for a birthright.
translation.ja: ここで国を守れ 役に立ちたい

translation.en: So you train the horses and you teach that boy how to defend himself.
translation.ja: 馬の調教と 彼に防御法を教えてやれ

translation.en: No one likes the third son of a dead king.
Father.
-Will you swear our lands to Aethelstan? -I must honor my word.
translation.ja: 新王に領地を渡す？ それが約束だ

translation.en: Northumbrians will be sad to lose their pagan lord.
translation.ja: 父さんは 最高の太守です

translation.en: [Finan] Gotcha!
-Look at this little bastard. -Are we ready?
[Sihtric] He's complaining about his saddle.
-Says his arse gets sore. -[Finan] Didn't say arse. I said my back.
translation.ja: 尻が痛いと 尻じゃなく背中だ

translation.en: [Ingrith] I made you this.
And one for each of you.
Men who sit on cold earth find the cold earth calls for them.
translation.ja: 冷たい大地に座ると 死が近寄るそうよ

translation.en: Once again, she shows herself a seer.
Lord, it was nothing.
Tell it again.
"Seven kings must die," Lord.
-"Seven kings--" -Ingrith, no.
Go on.
"And the woman you love."
I'm no king, and I have no woman.
-It means nothing. -[Aldhelm] Lord Uhtred.
translation.ja: 女もいない ウートレッド

translation.en: I told my son to train yours.
While you are here, take Wassa as your serving woman.
translation.ja: あなたの世話はワッサが

translation.en: -Make this fortress your home. -I wish to say one thing of Aethelstan.
translation.ja: ごゆっくり アゼルスタンだけど

translation.en: He is not quite the carefree boy you raised.
translation.ja: あなたが育てた頃とは 変わった

translation.en: He has grown very much into his faith.
translation.ja: 今は敬けんな信徒です

translation.en: The Brotherhood of Oswald exert great influence.
translation.ja: オズワルド教団の影響で

translation.en: I have scared off such men before. For some reason, monks find me terrifying.
translation.ja: 聖職者も負かしたことがある 俺は怖いらしい

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Let's go play kingmaker. -[Finan] Once again.
translation.ja: また 王を救いに行くか

translation.en: [Aethelstan] My father? No, that cannot be.
I thought God had given him the winter.
translation.ja: 冬は越せると思ったが

translation.en: [Pyrlig] Lord Aethelstan, you should make haste to Wessex for coronation.
translation.ja: 急いでウェセックスに戻り 戴冠式を

translation.en: Your brother gathers men.
Establish yourself at Winchester before he raises an army.
translation.ja: 弟君が兵を起こす前に

translation.en: We will leave when God commands us to leave, Father Pyrlig.
translation.ja: 神のご命令があれば戻ります

translation.en: And that command has not been given. Return when you have prayed.
translation.ja: 命令は下されていない あなたも祈りなさい

translation.en: [Aethelstan] Do I depart?
[Ingilmundr] Only the book has answers.
Play.
You have been guided to the Book of Matthew, verse 157.
translation.ja: 導かれたのは マタイ書157節です

translation.en: "Then Jesus went thence and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon."
translation.ja: “そして 主はチレとシドンに 出かけた”

translation.en: God wants you to fight.
Oh. Thank you, lady.
[sentry] Halt. State your business here.
translation.ja: 止まれ 　用件を言え

translation.en: We heard a man is looking for fighters.
translation.ja: 兵士を雇う男がいると

translation.en: We come to make some coin.
Go on.
-This place has fallen to shit. -[Uhtred] Edward left it to decline.
translation.ja: ひどい有様だな 王に放置された

translation.en: I'm glad Aethelflaed is not here to see it.
translation.ja: エセルフレドが悲しむ

translation.en: Word has spread.
[Sihtric] I swear I've fought half these men.
[Finan] This is not someone trying to recruit.
This is preparing for a battle.
[Uhtred] That is the youth Aelfweard.
Go see what men know of his plans.
-Is that amber in your sword? -How much do you want for it?
translation.ja: 琥珀(こはく)だな 売値を言え

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Go home to your mothers. -[teen 2] Edgar! No.
translation.ja: 家に帰れ やめとけ

translation.en: Wilfrid!
Wilfrid!
Do you speak to me, friend?
Your pardon. I thought you were Wilfrid.
A great man I fought with at Tettenhall.
Wait, you were at Tettenhall?
My father was there.
-Who do you fight for now? -Aelf… something?
translation.ja: 今は誰の下で エルフなんとかって名の

translation.en: -Saxon names are much alike. -The Aelf who marches on Wessex?
translation.ja: エルフなんとかって名の ウェセックスを攻める男

translation.en: You haven't heard.
No one's marching on Wessex.
I'm told the new plan is to lure Aethelstan here.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンをおびき寄せる

translation.en: Aethelstan is on his way.
Aelfweard challenged him to battle, and he's accepted.
translation.ja: エルフウィアドの挑戦を 受けたと

translation.en: Why would he agree to that?
Because he's young, and they've baited him.
They plan to snare him between the gate and men hidden in the hills.
translation.ja: 門と兵で挟み撃ちにすると

translation.en: Then we take control before he arrives.
We can't seize this town with just us, Lord.
We do not need to seize the town.
[Finan] Hey! Can I tempt you to play for money, friend?
translation.ja: 金を賭けてやらないか？

translation.en: [Uhtred] Tie them up and secure the bolt. Stay low until Aethelstan arrives.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンが来るまで 見つかるな

translation.en: [Finan] If there's a bed, it's mine.
[Uhtred] He's here.
[guard in distance] Raise the alarm! Soldiers approach the southern gate!
translation.ja: 警鐘だ 南門に兵が近づいてる

translation.en: [Aelfweard] Come no further! Aegelesburg is loyal to me now.
translation.ja: 止まれ この町は私の統治下にある

translation.en: We do not negotiate with bastards.
translation.ja: 私生子と話す気はない

translation.en: Nor do we surrender.
-You'll have to starve us out. -I am not foolish, brother.
translation.ja: 絶対に 私を見くびるな

translation.en: I assumed you would place a trap.
Perhaps delay me here until your forces could attack at rearguard.
translation.ja: 背後から攻撃するための 足止めだろ

translation.en: Show him what's left of his men!
[Aethelstan] You can yield now, or we destroy the gate and kill all your men.
translation.ja: 降伏しないと 門を破って皆殺しだ

translation.en: The gates will hold. No yield will come.
translation.ja: 破られない 降伏しない

translation.en: [Aethelstan] Then you will be destroyed.
Get ready to open the door.
[Aelfweard] I am the rightful king. Your mother was a whore.
All good men know it. You have no allies.
translation.ja: 情婦の子に 味方はいない

translation.en: Lord Aelfweard.
-I'm Uhtred of Bebbanburg. -Uhtred.
translation.ja: ウートレッドです なぜ

translation.en: [Uhtred] You know me as a man who speaks the truth,
so hear me when I say, for the common good, stand down.
translation.ja: 私を信じて 降伏してください

translation.en: My men control the gate. You're outnumbered on all sides.
translation.ja: 門も押さえた 数で勝ち目はない

translation.en: Yield.
Let this end with peace.
[Aethelstan] Give yourself to me, brother.
Then it is over.
Forgive me for my failings, and give comfort to my mother's kin.
translation.ja: 私の失敗を許し 母の家族を慰めてくれ

translation.en: Tell them of my exile
and how we sought to honor our discarded bloodline.
translation.ja: 血統を守るため 戦ったと伝えよ

translation.en: -For Wessex! -[men] For Wessex!
translation.ja: ウェセックスのために

translation.en: Lord Uhtred,
open the gate.
-No! -[Aethelstan] God chose me rightful heir.
translation.ja: よせ！ 神は私を選んだ

translation.en: [Uhtred] Aethelstan!
Advance!
Leave no enemy alive!
[Finan] Lord, stop this madness!
[Uhtred] Stop!
[Uhtred] Aethelstan!
[Sihtric] Get back! Hide!
-[mercenary] I submit! Please don't-- -[grunts]
Aethelstan!
[mercenary] Please, show mercy!
[Uhtred] No!
Stop! They're surrendering!
translation.ja: やめろ 降伏しただろ

translation.en: Aethelstan!
-Aethelsta-- -[high-pitched ringing]
[man] Lord! Lord, help us!
Aethelstan!
Aethelstan!
-Stand down your men. -[Aethelstan] Uhtred, why are you here?
translation.ja: やめさせろ なぜ いる

translation.en: [Uhtred] To stop this. Your enemy has surrendered. Halt your men.
translation.ja: 攻撃をやめろ 敵は もう降伏している

translation.en: -Let him approach and call a halt. -[guard] Yes, my lord.
-What happened to you? -What happened to you?
translation.ja: その顔は？ どうかしてる

translation.en: -You had no need to kill your brother. -I did, or in time, he would return.
translation.ja: 弟を殺すなど さもなくば反撃される

translation.en: -You dishonored your word. -I did not.
I told him to yield. I did not say he would survive.
translation.ja: 殺さないとは言ってない

translation.en: It was never our plan to let him live. Lord, reverse the order.
translation.ja: それが計画だった 勝利は目の前です 攻撃再開を

translation.en: We are close to routing them.
translation.ja: 勝利は目の前です 攻撃再開を

translation.en: -Hired men have no quarrel with you. -You were right not to seek his help.
translation.ja: 雇われ兵に罪はない 彼は味方じゃない

translation.en: You kill 100 fathers, you give 300 sons a reason to defy you.
translation.ja: 100人の父親を殺し その息子らに恨まれる

translation.en: Think!
Now's the time to unify.
Uhtred may be right in this matter.
I speak only as a man who has made mistakes before.
translation.ja: 俺も間違った経験がある

translation.en: -I'm Uhtred of-- -I know who you are.
translation.ja: 俺の名は… 知ってる

translation.en: [Aethelstan] Uhtred, this is Lord Ingilmundr.
A great commander and a great friend to me.
Then a friend to me.
Why the Danish name?
Born to a Dane, but raised a Saxon.
I found Christ through the works of Alfred,
and indeed through the writings of your son in Rome.
You must be proud of him.
He is a true scholar.
I'm just the fool who made him.
Ingilmundr holds the garrison at Thelwael on the Wirral.
translation.ja: 彼の軍隊は テルウェールにいる

translation.en: He knows many of the people we knew from Rumcofa.
translation.ja: ランコファの人々も 知っている

translation.en: Good people. I should like to see them again.
[Ingilmundr] Yes. Perhaps after you've sworn Northumbria to the new king.
translation.ja: 新王にノーサンブリアを 渡した後にでも

translation.en: Honor your word.
Swear to Aethelstan what you denied his father.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンに国を渡し——

translation.en: Cede your lands and make England whole.
translation.ja: イングランド統一を誓え

translation.en: As you say, it is the time for unity.
translation.ja: 統一の時だと言ったのは君だ

translation.en: I will swear to a king, and you are not yet crowned.
translation.ja: 王になら誓うが まだなっていない

translation.en: Nor will I kneel to you covered in blood.
I will renounce my lands in the Great Hall at Winchester.
translation.ja: ウィンチェスターで渡す

translation.en: -It doesn't need to be done with ceremony. -But Uhtred is a man of his word.
translation.ja: 言い逃れだ 彼は約束を守る男だ

translation.en: Come to Winchester.
Heal the wound.
[Ingilmundr] How did he know we were coming here?
translation.ja: なぜ 計画が知れた

translation.en: [Aethelstan] He's always found a way to protect me.
Perhaps he has friends who keep one eye on you.
translation.ja: 誰かに見張らせてるかも

translation.en: [chuckles] My mother was the same.
It's touching, how you still defer to him.
-He's been steadfast a long time. -And noble that you trust him.
translation.ja: 長年 忠実だ 立派なご信頼です

translation.en: Given all that went on with your father.
translation.ja: お父上との確執を思うと

translation.en: [Constantin] Which boy prevailed?
[Domnal] Aethelstan.
Killed his brother in cold blood and will now claim the Saxon crown.
translation.ja: 冷酷に弟を殺し サクソンの王になる 冷酷に弟を殺し サクソンの王になる １：スコットランド王

translation.en: [Constantin] Then it's settled. Any word on renewal of the treaty?
translation.ja: 条約の継続について何か？

translation.en: Push Winchester.
-Make contact. -Lord, we've had word of something else.
translation.ja: こちらから 知らせが入りました

translation.en: -The Dane, Anlaf, seeks a meeting. -The one who eats the flesh of men?
translation.ja: アンラフが集会をと 人肉を食うやつか

translation.en: An assembly with you, and the kings of Man, Shetland, and Orkney.
translation.ja: マン シェトランド オークニーも一緒に

translation.en: I will not be the lone Christian lured to meet Dane kings.
translation.ja: デーン人の王に キリスト教徒は俺だけ

translation.en: They might offer something of interest.
Seek to renew a peace with Saxons.
Edward kept the truce. We have no reason to think his son will not.
translation.ja: 父親同様 新王も 停戦を守るはず

translation.en: [Domnal] I'll send word.
[Anlaf] His own flesh, put to the knife.
translation.ja: 肉親を—— 殺すとはな

translation.en: -He is more brutal than you suggested. -His heart has hardened.
translation.ja: 予想より残忍だ より冷酷に

translation.en: Which should harden those against him.
-Do other kings in Britain hear our call? -They pretend to be deaf to us.
translation.ja: 各王から返事は？ 返答はしなくても

translation.en: -But I know they listen. -They should.
translation.ja: 考えてます 当然だ

translation.en: Aethelstan will become greedy.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンは欲を出す

translation.en: You would know ambition, Father.
Eh, and when my lands are yours, you will know it too.
translation.ja: お前も領地を継げば分かる

translation.en: Return to Winchester.
Watch everyone.
And bring me word when there's word to tell.
-[Uhtred grunts] -[Osbert] Father, have you been injured?
-Nothing that will not heal. -[Eadgifu] Tell me the news is wrong.
translation.ja: すぐ治る アゼルスタンは本当に 弟を裏切ったの？

translation.en: -Did Aethelstan turn on his own blood? -[Uhtred] Yes.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンは本当に 弟を裏切ったの？ はい 殺しました

translation.en: -Aelfweard did not survive. -Then Edmund cannot return to Winchester.
translation.ja: はい 殺しました エドマンドが危険ね

translation.en: He will always be seen as a rival.
Aethelstan has always shown great affection for your son.
translation.ja: 彼をかわいがってました

translation.en: [Uhtred] But she is right.
He has fallen under an influence.
translation.ja: 悪い影響を受けている

translation.en: I shall not leave Bebbanburg until the threat passes.
translation.ja: 危険が去るまでここに

translation.en: -You're welcome here as long as you wish. -[Aldhelm] And it will pass.
translation.ja: もちろんです 今だけです

translation.en: The duties of kingship will focus Aethelstan's mind.
translation.ja: 王の責務に没頭するはず

translation.en: But I should return south.
I will assess the mood.
[Pyrlig] Almighty and everlasting God,
pour out the spirit of thy grace and blessing upon this, thy servant, King Aethelstan.
translation.ja: 尊い愛と祝福を アゼルスタン王に与えたまえ

translation.en: That, as by the imposition of our hands, he is this day crowned king.
translation.ja: 今日ここに 王位を授けられたり

translation.en: So he may, by thy sanctification,
translation.ja: 聖なる者となり 主イエスに従い

translation.en: continue always thy chosen servant, through Christ, our Lord.
translation.ja: 永遠(とわ)に選ばれし僕(しもべ)で あらんことを

translation.en: Grant him the faith of Abraham,
the wisdom of Solomon, the courage of David.
translation.ja: ソロモンの知恵 ダビデの勇気を与えたまえ

translation.en: [crowd] Vivat Rex! Vivat Rex!
Vivat Rex! Vivat Rex!
translation.ja: ２：ウェセックス/マーシャ/ イースト･アングリア国王

translation.en: [Aethelstan] You were not there. This moment was all we had talked of.
translation.ja: 共に目指した戴冠式に 来なかった

translation.en: -And you were not there. -No.
I was here.
The call of the scripture always comes first.
translation.ja: 聖書が何より大切です

translation.en: You believe that, don't you?
Yes, yes, of course.
Then you will be a great king of England.
translation.ja: 偉大な王になるでしょう

translation.en: And all will speak of you as they did Alfred.
translation.ja: アルフレッドのように

translation.en: Does Uhtred stand by his word?
No. Uhtred has not come.
-Clearly, he-- -He wishes to remain king in his own land.
translation.ja: 彼は… 領地を手放しません

translation.en: May God protect him from his vanity.
But towards you, it is a cruelty.
And I am sorry. Here. Come. Come.
translation.ja: かわいそうに　さあ

translation.en: What torture to enact on so kind a soul.
translation.ja: 彼は優しさにつけこんだ

translation.en: -I thought you had both abandoned me. -Of course I would not.
translation.ja: 俺を見捨てるな もちろんです

translation.en: I'm just surprised Uhtred could be so foolish.
translation.ja: ウートレッドは愚かだ

translation.en: You would've thought his years would make him wiser.
translation.ja: 無駄に年をとったようだ

translation.en: Perhaps he still sees the boy you once were,
translation.ja: 今でも あなたを子供扱い

translation.en: and not the man you have become.
[Finan] Lord.
It's not Serpent's Breath, but…
translation.ja: 大蛇の吐息の代わりに

translation.en: it's lighter, it's sharper, and it's got a garnet.
translation.ja: あれよりも軽くて鋭く… 宝石付き

translation.en: Give it a name.
Manslayer.
Ball-taker.
Uhtred, Sword of Uhtred.
You actually smiled, Lord.
Perhaps losing my sword was a sign that my battle days are over.
translation.ja: 剣をなくすとは もう戦うなという意味か

translation.en: A bad time to provoke the king.
[Uhtred] I did not provoke him.
I'm simply giving him time to prove he's not a tyrant.
translation.ja: 王が自分で気付く時間を 与えた

translation.en: -Otherwise… -Otherwise what?
"Seven kings must die." For what?
-What did your wife see? -She sees nothing.
I swear.
[Eadgifu] What do they celebrate?
[Uhtred] The breaking of the horses.
[Eadgifu] Thank Osbert for the care he has shown Edmund.
translation.ja: オズバートに感謝を伝えて

translation.en: [Uhtred] He's part of Bebbanburg now.
You both are.
[Eadgifu] Yes, my son is quite changed.
There was a somberness at the palace that has lifted.
It's the air here.
Brings out good spirits in everyone.
translation.ja: 誰もに 良い影響を与える

translation.en: [Uhtred] You yourself seem happier.
I am, Lord Uhtred.
Some grief has passed, and I feel…
translation.ja: 悲しみが消えつつあり…

translation.en: more ready for the world.
[Osbert] Control! Good!
translation.ja: しっかりと　そうだ

translation.en: Forgive us these sins that we commit.
translation.ja: 主よ　我らの罪を お許しください

translation.en: Will we be forgiven?
Our sin weighs heavy.
Yes, it does.
But remember,
God holds us in the balance.
Every sin can be weighed against an act of faith.
translation.ja: 罪と信仰を天秤(てんびん)にかけます

translation.en: Grow the faith and the sin is diminished.
What if the shadow of sin obscures the faith?
translation.ja: 罪の重みが信仰に勝れば？

translation.en: Come.
Perhaps return to your grandfather's vision for England.
translation.ja: 大王の描いた イングランドです

translation.en: Perhaps now there is an urgency to bring the pagans to light.
translation.ja: 異教徒に教え諭す時では？

translation.en: Will that cleanse me? Us?
translation.ja: それが私たちの 償いとなるのか？

translation.en: Well, surely the greater the lands, the greater the faith.
translation.ja: 領地が大きいほど 信仰は深い

translation.en: Go beyond what Alfred dreamed of.
Look to the islands God made, not the countries ordained by men,
translation.ja: 国は関係ない 神が創った島々を キリスト教にする

translation.en: and bring all to Christianity.
translation.ja: 神が創った島々を キリスト教にする

translation.en: So when you are judged,
you will be found in balance.
translation.ja: 天秤は平衡になります

translation.en: And thus may accept both the sin…
and the conquest against it.
[Finan] Lord!
Stop.
[Eadgifu] What do you talk of?
Oh my faith, Lady. I cannot lie.
translation.ja: 奥様　正直に言います

translation.en: The ladies here care for Lord Uhtred and wish keenly he would find a woman.
translation.ja: ウートレッド様に いい女性がいないかと

translation.en: Well, they shall be sore of heart. The widow of a king will not marry a lord.
translation.ja: 残念だけど 王の未亡人は 太守とは結婚しない

translation.en: I shall have to be more careful in how I conduct myself.
translation.ja: 言動に注意しなければ

translation.en: It is not the gossips you should fear, Lady.
translation.ja: それより 恐れることが

translation.en: This peace may not sustain.
Lord Uhtred has snubbed the king.
translation.ja: 太守様は王を侮辱した

translation.en: The women Uhtred has affection for become a target for his enemies.
translation.ja: 太守様が愛する女は 狙われます

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Sihtric! -Sh-sh.
[Uhtred] What have you learnt?
Aethelstan has claimed Eoferwic.
He says since Rognvaldr is dead, there is no king, so it belongs to him.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンの 統治下になりました

translation.en: Eoferwic?
They see me as their lord now. Aethelstan knows this.
translation.ja: 俺が治めているのは 王も承知だ

translation.en: He is demanding all come with tribute.
translation.ja: 貢ぎ物を持ってこいと

translation.en: Not just Saxon chiefs, but all kings of Britain.
translation.ja: サクソン人だけでなく ブリテン中の

translation.en: All the mainland and all the outlying islands.
translation.ja: すべての王に要求してます

translation.en: Lord?
Declare yourself king here. Like your forebears.
translation.ja: ここで王になってください

translation.en: No. This is Aethelstan.
If he chooses the wrong path, I must tell him.
translation.ja: 彼の間違いは 俺が正す

translation.en: [Sihtric] Lord.
"There went out a decree that all the world should be taxed."
translation.ja: “勅令が出た すべての者は税金を払え”

translation.en: You owe no tribute! Return to your villages.
translation.ja: 貢ぎ物は必要ない　村へ戻れ

translation.en: -Uhtred! Calm yourself. -Pyrlig? What is this tribute?
translation.ja: ウートレッド　落ち着いて どういうことだ

translation.en: He says it is to build churches, but, please, there are spies everywhere.
translation.ja: 教会を建てると どうか 小声で

translation.en: Tell your arseling apprentice he's badly misjudged the mood of Scotland.
translation.ja: スコットランドをなめるなと 小僧に伝えろ

translation.en: You seem upset.
We came to renew our treaty.
Instead, we've been left waiting for days, only to be told we are supplicants.
translation.ja: だが 何日も待たされた上 願い出ろと言われた

translation.en: I would be careful.
We've had other offers of alliance.
translation.ja: 他の同盟に誘われてる

translation.en: -Why is Aethelstan doing this? -He says to unite Christians.
translation.ja: なぜなんだ 信徒を統一すると

translation.en: And in his prayers, he talks much of atonement.
translation.ja: 罪の償いを祈っています

translation.en: Atonement? For what?
translation.ja: 償うって 何の罪を

translation.en: The death of his brother, the bastardy of his parentage?
translation.ja: 弟の死か 自分の不義の出自か

translation.en: I do not know.
Lord Aldhelm and I try daily to dissuade,
but there is talk of conquest and forced baptism.
translation.ja: 征服して 洗礼を強要するとまで

translation.en: -Where is he? -The Devil's Stones.
translation.ja: 今 どこに 悪魔の岩

translation.en: He thinks he fights the devil.
[Uhtred] This is madness. Aldhelm.
These stones have stood for generations.
They are an insult to God, apparently.
translation.ja: 神への冒涜(ぼうとく)だそうだ

translation.en: Is that Owain, King of Strathclyde?
translation.ja: あれはオワイン王 あれはオワイン王 ３： ストラスクライド国王

translation.en: [Aldhelm] Aethelstan wanted him to witness it.
translation.ja: ３： ストラスクライド国王 祖先が建てた石だから 見ろと

translation.en: They were built by his forebears.
translation.ja: 祖先が建てた石だから 見ろと

translation.en: He is seeking to humiliate powerful men?
translation.ja: 国の王を侮辱する気か

translation.en: [Uhtred] King Hywel.
translation.ja: ハイウェル王 ４：ウェラス国王

translation.en: He dares ask submission from Wealas?
translation.ja: ウェラスにまで服従しろと？

translation.en: After all you did for Mercia?
What choice do I have, Uhtred?
He took my son to Winchester.
-He is keeping your son hostage? -You take the son, you take a future king.
translation.ja: 人質として？ 未来の王が捕らわれた

translation.en: -Now I am forced to follow his bidding. -I will tell him this cannot stand.
translation.ja: 命令に従うほかない 俺がやめさせる

translation.en: King Hywel, I swear, Wealas's faithfulness will not be spat on.
translation.ja: 忠実なウェラスを 足蹴にさせない

translation.en: Our poets spoke this.
That a Saxon would break us all to build their country.
translation.ja: “サクソン人が破壊し 彼らの国をつくる”と

translation.en: This is not just a Saxon country.
Aldhelm, get me close to him. I will stop this.
translation.ja: アルドヘルム 王へ案内しろ

translation.en: [guard] Halt. Stay back.
[Aldhelm] Step aside! The king requested Uhtred speak with him.
translation.ja: 通せ　王に呼ばれた

translation.en: King Aethelstan!
[Uhtred] Lord King,
let me speak with you alone.
[Uhtred] You should not have stepped on my land.
You should not have broken your word, humiliated me,
translation.ja: 約束を破った 父上同様 私をも 侮辱した

translation.en: as you humiliated my father.
translation.ja: 父上同様 私をも 侮辱した

translation.en: I'm trying to make you see you're on the wrong path.
translation.ja: 目を覚ましてほしかった

translation.en: -You do the bidding of Ingilmundr-- -I do the bidding of the Lord.
translation.ja: 指示はイングル… 神の指示だ

translation.en: Do you really seek to convert Danes?
translation.ja: デーン人を改宗させる？

translation.en: -Did I teach you nothing of respect? -Many Danes welcome the Lord.
translation.ja: 敬意を持て 多くは神を受け入れている

translation.en: -Those in my court thank me for it. -Many do not wish it, and you know this.
translation.ja: 多くは神を受け入れている 望まない者も多い

translation.en: Aethelstan, you've always known it.
-Even Alfred respected this. -I have more to atone for than Alfred.
translation.ja: 大王も尊重した 罪を償うためだ

translation.en: Who tells you this? Ingilmundr?
Does he tell you you are damned without his guidance?
translation.ja: さもないと 地獄に行くとでも？

translation.en: For I've seen before men under the spell of those who claim to know the gods.
translation.ja: そんな呪縛に陥った者を 見てきた

translation.en: He has been a great friend to me.
Aethelstan, hump who you wish,
but do not fall under the influence of those who seek power--
translation.ja: だが 欲にかられた者の 言葉を聞くな

translation.en: Who makes such vicious claim against me?
-No one. -Who tells such lies?
-It has not been talked of. -Lord Aldhelm, does he spy for…
translation.ja: 誰も アルドヘルムか？

translation.en: What has been said, by who, and for how long?
No one has said anything. I care not for that, but for you.
translation.ja: 誰も言ってないし 俺は気にしない

translation.en: Aethelstan, you are a kind man, but you are tenderhearted,
translation.ja: お前は優しいが 弱くもある

translation.en: and Ingilmundr is seeking power for himself and for his brotherhood.
translation.ja: 彼は権力が欲しいだけだ

translation.en: Lies. Lies and ignominy.
There's no ignominy. He just turns you from your kin.
translation.ja: 違う　弟を殺させたろ

translation.en: And you are turned from your king! You seek to be one yourself.
translation.ja: 自分こそ 王になりたいのだろう

translation.en: Lord, they consecrate the ground
and would request you to give the blessing.
Yes, of course.
Let us leave the King of Northumbria to think on his errors.
translation.ja: ノーサンブリア国王は自省を

translation.en: I have no dream to be a king.
Only to protect you.
Like you ran to protect him in Aegelesburg and ended up being beaten by boys?
translation.ja: エゲレスバーグでは 王を守るどころか襲われた

translation.en: Should he really take counsel from a man who loses his sword to a child?
translation.ja: 子供に剣をとられる男の 忠告など

translation.en: Northumbria needs a lord with lust for battle.
There are rumors Anlaf has arrived and will come Viking.
translation.ja: アンラフが攻めてくるそうだ

translation.en: Do not think he will spare you just because you follow the same gods.
translation.ja: 同じ宗教だから助かると 思うな

translation.en: Keep him here a night and make him swear at dawn.
translation.ja: 明朝 忠誠を誓わせては？

translation.en: In time, you will come begging for his help.
translation.ja: いずれ 王に泣きつく

translation.en: As all fathers fall,
and all sons take their place.
Lord Ingilmundr has declared you an enemy of God
translation.ja: あなたは神の敵として 狙われます

translation.en: to incite his followers to kill you.
translation.ja: イングルマンダーの差し金で

translation.en: Aethelstan would not allow it.
Which is why Ingilmundr seeks to keep his hands clean of it and has left the camp.
translation.ja: 彼は無関係を装うため ここを出ました

translation.en: To go where?
[Aldhelm] This way.
Go up and around. There's no guard.
Him. That is the man.
What did you speak of with the pagan?
[sentry] Horsemen approach!
[Osbert] Stay back from my gates and tell me who you are.
translation.ja: その場で 何者か言え

translation.en: Lord Ingilmundr, and I come at Lord Uhtred's request.
translation.ja: 私はイングルマンダー

translation.en: He's delayed in Eoferwic as he renews his vow to the king.
translation.ja: エフォウィックの ウートレッドからの要請で

translation.en: He asked I help protect you.
Protect from what?
There is a rumor of Wolf-Warriors landed near Derwent.
translation.ja: オオカミ兵が上陸したらしい

translation.en: [guard] Open the gate! Open the gate!
Do not give the order.
Think on all we have shared.
You're lost from yourself, Aethelstan.
translation.ja: あなたは自分を見失いました

translation.en: We fought together--
And despite this, you drip poison against me and plot with Uhtred. -No. -Yes.
translation.ja: うわさを流し ウートレッドと結託した

translation.en: -No. -Yes!
You turned your back, Aldhelm.
Now I turn mine.
[Eadgifu] Lord Ingilmundr, you bring welcome news of Lord Uhtred's supplication.
translation.ja: ウートレッドが 忠誠を誓うとは 朗報だわ

translation.en: Will you journey south with me to let me bear witness to it?
translation.ja: 見たいので 私を連れて行って

translation.en: Lady, we have ridden hard to get here. At least let us rest a day or so.
translation.ja: 長旅でしたので １日休ませてください

translation.en: Oh, but I have been trapped in Bebbanburg a good while.
translation.ja: ここから早く出たいの

translation.en: Believe me, you do not want to find yourself here longer than intended.
translation.ja: あなたも ベバンバーグに長居は無用よ

translation.en: -They've been warned! -[Finan] Now!
We overtook you on the road.
Whatever power you hold over Aethelstan, today it ends.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンを操るのも 今日で終わりだ

translation.en: [Ingilmundr grunts] My sword!
You still believe in Valhalla!
Aethelstan cares for you. I will not divide us further.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンの友人だ 殺さぬ

translation.en: Put him below.
Christians amongst you, defend me! Who is your Lord?
translation.ja: キリスト教徒よ 助けを 主はウートレッドか イエスか？

translation.en: Lord Uhtred or the Lord Jesus Christ?
translation.ja: 主はウートレッドか イエスか？

translation.en: The people of Bebbanburg will not be divided by faith.
translation.ja: ここでは信仰は関係ない

translation.en: Rise up, you fools!
Tell the king the terms of his release.
He makes peace with Northumbria and guarantees the border.
translation.ja: ノーサンブリアとの和解と 不可侵

translation.en: -No one is forced to follow his god. -Yes, Lord.
translation.ja: 信仰の自由だ はい

translation.en: Quite a price.
-Will Aethelstan agree? -[Uhtred] Let us hope so.
translation.ja: 承諾する？ そう望む

translation.en: He seems to discard his friends rather quickly now.
translation.ja: 最近は友人でも見捨てる

translation.en: [Ingilmundr] Truly, you bless an unworthy soul.
-May God reward your kindness. -Amen.
translation.ja: 神の祝福を アーメン

translation.en: [Anlaf] Aethelstan turns against his friends.
translation.ja: ７：マン国王 アゼルスタンは 友人さえ殺す アゼルスタンは 友人さえ殺す

translation.en: Succumbs to a wild dream to be a monarch for all your land.
translation.ja: 統一国の君主になる誘惑に 屈した

translation.en: In time, he will come for you, Shetland.
translation.ja: じきに そっちへ侵攻する

translation.en: You, Orkney.
He will take what belonged to your forebears and call it Britain.
translation.ja: 先祖の領地を盗み ブリテンと呼ぶだろう

translation.en: [Shetland] No.
He barely sets his foot upon the water. Saxon country folk.
translation.ja: 海に出たこともない サクソン人だ

translation.en: We can repel them.
I'm not talking of repelling, but of meeting conquest with conquest.
translation.ja: 侵攻には侵攻で 応えようってことだ

translation.en: [Domnal] Scotland rejects your offer.
translation.ja: スコットランドは手を引く

translation.en: We cannot join with pagans to attack a man who's not threatened us.
translation.ja: 脅威でもない国を 異教徒と攻めるなど

translation.en: Christians do not choose war.
War is coming.
You only have to choose a side.
[Ingilmundr] God be with you.
[Wassa] The stone was rolled away, as in the scripture.
It can only be the work of an angel.
This way, Lord. Come and see the treasures.
translation.ja: 太守様 どうかご覧ください

translation.en: [Sihtric] Lord!
What word from Eoferwic?
Does he accept my terms?
I have no news.
Aethelstan is said to have returned to Winchester.
translation.ja: ウィンチェスターに帰ったと

translation.en: Well, let us take it as a good sign.
Perhaps without his shadow, Aethelstan sees more clearly.
translation.ja: 彼に操られず 冷静になったのかも

translation.en: [Sihtric] What trouble brings you out here?
[Finan] The villagers were hunting for pagan silver.
Now they're saying it's a miracle.
[Wassa] Make way for the King of Northumbria.
I told you.
They think of you as a king.
[Finan] Do you think they hope to keep half for themselves?
translation.ja: 財宝の分け前が目当てか

translation.en: [Sihtric] They likely took it from Bebbanburg in the first place.
translation.ja: 元はベバンバーグの物じゃ？

translation.en: [man] You are detained in the name of King Aethelstan.
translation.ja: 国王の命により捕らえる

translation.en: [Finan] Lord.
We've been lured here.
You think?
[Wassa] Lord, I'm sorry!
I'm sorry, Lord.
The prisoner told me I had to, or I'd burn in the fires of hell.
translation.ja: やらなければ地獄に落ちると 捕虜に言われて

translation.en: I will never order to open the gates.
[man] Really?
A gift from the king.
Aethelstan did this?
It's what he does to traitors.
Open the gates or I slaughter your father.
Comply and he will be spared.
Do not open.
-I can kill him in front of you. -Do not open!
translation.ja: 今 殺そう ダメだ オズバート

translation.en: -The choice is yours. -[Uhtred] Osbert! Do not open!
translation.ja: ダメだ オズバート 決めろ 開けるな

translation.en: In your absence, Father, I command here.
translation.ja: 今は 僕が指揮官だ

translation.en: And I command that we open.
-No! -[Sihtric] No, no, no!
[guard] Drop your sword.
Move.
No.
Where is Aethelstan?
In time.
Bring me the Lady Eadgifu.
Come. [grunts]
[Eadgifu] I can walk.
[Eadgifu] Go on.
[Ingilmundr] You are to be placed in the community on Lindisfarne to protect your virtue.
translation.ja: リンディスファーンで 純潔にお暮しください

translation.en: Did you hump the heathen, Lady?
Confess.
I confess
to have prayed for your excruciating death.
translation.ja: あなたに残虐な死をと 祈ったことを

translation.en: A no, then. You should have tried when you had the chance.
translation.ja: 祈りは通じなかった 手遅れだ

translation.en: We're taking your son to my garrison at Thelwael where he will be trained for battle.
translation.ja: 息子はテルウェールの 私の軍隊に入れる

translation.en: No. No. Please.
-[guard] Move! -Your son also.
[Eadgifu] No. Edmund is the blood of Alfred. He should not be fodder for a shield wall! Please!
translation.ja: アルフレッドの血族を 楯にするなんて

translation.en: -[Osbert] I will take care of him. -Please!
The son of Uhtred stands for Wessex.
translation.ja: 息子はウェセックスの楯か

translation.en: [Finan] Hey! Hey!
You, we have a plan for.
-[Uhtred] Am I to be drowned in the sea? -[Ingilmundr] I never quite know his mind.
translation.ja: 海に沈めるのか？ 王の考え次第だ

translation.en: [Uhtred] Do not punish those in Bebbanburg.
translation.ja: 民は罰するな 王の相手は俺だ

translation.en: -His fight is with me. -His fight is elsewhere.
translation.ja: 民は罰するな 王の相手は俺だ 他に相手がいる

translation.en: How lucky we have found ourselves so close to the Scottish border.
translation.ja: スコットランド国境に近い

translation.en: No, do not invade Scotland. You will lose hundreds of men.
translation.ja: やめろ　大勢が犠牲になる

translation.en: And unleash a war for generations.
The king has no successor to fear for. It makes him strong.
translation.ja: 世継ぎがいないから 王は強い

translation.en: Do whatever you must to protect our sons. Do not fight him. Just capitulate.
translation.ja: 是が非でも 私たちの息子を守って

translation.en: Anything else is foolish.
-Aldhelm never betrayed you. -All of you betrayed me.
translation.ja: アルドヘルムは潔白だ 皆 裏切り者だ

translation.en: All those I thought as friends.
Swear now, before Bebbanburg, and I will spare your life.
translation.ja: 忠誠を誓えば命は助ける

translation.en: -No. -Then you leave me with no choice.
translation.ja: いやだ では 仕方ない

translation.en: Aethelstan.
I cannot.
-Let me offer my-- -No.
Take everything from him.
I banish you from my lands to travel the earth and seas alone.
translation.ja: 私の領地から消え 独りで遠くへ行け

translation.en: On pain of murder of your son.
translation.ja: 息子の死を悔いながら

translation.en: Let none feed or clothe him, lest become my enemy.
translation.ja: 彼に衣食を与える者は 私の敵だ

translation.en: Go.
Before this mercy vanishes.
[Hywel] Turn back. There is still time.
translation.ja: スコットランド国境 まだ引き返せる スコットランド国境

translation.en: The Scots are no threat.
translation.ja: スコットランド国境 敵に回すな

translation.en: This will damn you, Lord King.
[Hywel] To save us from the pagans can be a just endeavor.
translation.ja: 異教徒と戦うことは試練だ

translation.en: But to turn on other Christians is ungodly.
translation.ja: だが キリスト教徒への 攻撃は罪深い

translation.en: [Hywel] Your men do not want this fight.
[Aethelstan] Well, perhaps I need better men.
Perhaps I should summon your son.
Lord King!
Aethelstan has attacked settlements in the lowlands.
translation.ja: 低地の集落が襲われました

translation.en: He cannot raid us without reply.
Do I tell Anlaf you are ready to meet with him and the other kings?
translation.ja: 同盟の意思を アンラフに伝えますか？

translation.en: Uhtred the Daneslayer.
You killed my cousin Gelf at the battle of Beamfleot.
translation.ja: 戦で私のいとこを殺したな

translation.en: Send word we have found him.
I hated Gelf.
Take him to the king.
[Uhtred] Where are you taking me?
[woman] To the very north of these islands.
-[Uhtred] What do you give thanks for? -For the great battle to come.
translation.ja: 何の祝いだ 来たる戦いのため

translation.en: Tell the jarl we're here with the King of Northumbria.
translation.ja: ノーサンブリア王が来たと

translation.en: -[Uhtred] All folk of Shetland? -[woman] Some of Man and Orkney join us.
translation.ja: シェトランド人？ マン人にオークニー人

translation.en: With their kings. [chuckles]
[Anlaf] Is this who they claim? The King of Northumbria?
translation.ja: ノーサンブリアの王か？

translation.en: [Constantin] Aye, it's him.
-I am no king. -[Anlaf] No.
But you could be.
Sit. You are amongst friends.
translation.ja: 座れ　俺らは味方だ

translation.en: [Uhtred] You join with pagans?
Aethelstan has taken an axe to the truce.
translation.ja: アゼルスタンは停戦を破った

translation.en: A truce you brokered.
What he has done in the villages of the lowlands--
-Is it worse than his cruelty in Irland? -Tales to spread fear.
translation.ja: 彼よりひどいと？ 作り話だ

translation.en: [Constantin] We had no choice but to defend ourselves.
translation.ja: 自分の領地を守るためだ

translation.en: We did not start this.
-How did you find me? Who's your spy? -We have many spies. We know many things.
translation.ja: どうやって俺を見つけた 内通者がいる

translation.en: [Constantin] We know Aethelstan has banished you.
translation.ja: 追放のことも知ってる

translation.en: And we know he gets humped like a woman.
That may be customary to you pagans,
translation.ja: 異教徒の慣例かもしれんが

translation.en: but as a Christian, it cannot be endured.
translation.ja: キリスト教徒には耐え難い

translation.en: -He endures it often, from what I hear. -So…
translation.ja: 頻繁だと聞く… つまり…

translation.en: As a man who shares our enemy,
translation.ja: 同じ敵を持つ者として

translation.en: we ask you to join with us, Uhtred, in our alliance.
translation.ja: この同盟に加わってほしい

translation.en: Stand against the tyrant.
I'm heartsick of battles.
What has become of the warrior? Do you no longer yearn for Valhalla?
translation.ja: ヴァルハラを あきらめたのか？

translation.en: Do you know the prophecy, Uhtred?
The ancient prophecy of my people?
All of Britain will unite against the Saxons, push them into the Kentish sea,
translation.ja: “ブリテンひとつとなりて サクソン人 海に落ちぬ”

translation.en: return the feals to the line of Arthur.
translation.ja: “アーサーの血に 忠誠帰す”

translation.en: [Anlaf] There.
The vision of an old man.
-So it must be true. -We Northumbrians also have a prophecy.
translation.ja: 真実に違いない 俺の国にも予言が

translation.en: "Seven kings must die."
That holds no fear.
Each man here has a son to take his place.
translation.ja: 皆 後を継ぐ息子がいる

translation.en: [Owain] Seven kings die,
translation.ja: ７人の王が死ねば 新たに７人が——

translation.en: seven will, in that moment, be made.
translation.ja: ７人の王が死ねば 新たに７人が—— 誕生する

translation.en: [Anlaf] It's true.
If you make a child, your kingdom stands beyond you.
translation.ja: 子があれば 王国は続く

translation.en: A kingdom ravaged by war, yes.
[Constantin] Then there is another way to consider.
translation.ja: では 別の方法ではどうだ

translation.en: If you wish to save many from bloodshed.
translation.ja: 多くの命を救いたいなら

translation.en: Kill one man only.
Kill the king who has attacked us all.
translation.ja: 我々を攻撃した王を殺せ

translation.en: Return to him in… supplication.
Seize the moment.
Save many lives by simply taking one.
translation.ja: ひとつの命をとれば 多くが救われる

translation.en: [Anlaf] The alternative, of course, is war.
Seven kings against one.
If Aethelstan wanted to unite the tribes of Britain,
translation.ja: ブリテンの統一が望みなら

translation.en: he has succeeded.
[Anlaf] Why do you seek us here?
Your part is to keep Winchester aroused.
translation.ja: そばで王をたきつけろ

translation.en: You let Uhtred go free. Why?
translation.ja: なぜウートレッドを解放した

translation.en: I sent him away.
To kill your friend, the king.
-Well, he will be killed in the attempt. -[woman chuckles]
Uhtred has skills you do not.
He attacks Aethelstan. Aethelstan attacks him.
translation.ja: どちらが殺してもいい

translation.en: It barely matters.
Either way, we face in battle men whose spirits have been broken.
translation.ja: 我々は絶望した者を 相手に戦う

translation.en: Ingilmundr, go to the West. The time is near.
translation.ja: 西に行け　すぐに始まる

translation.en: Astrid, watch our friends in Northumbria.
translation.ja: アストリドは ノーサンブリアへ

translation.en: [Aethelstan] I did not think I would see you again.
Lord King.
In the name of my son, I beg forgiveness.
Spare him.
Let me kneel to you.
Then I lift your banishment.
Give me a sword and then leave us.
Go on, then.
Do it.
I swear this on my son's life.
Hear this as an oath.
Ingilmundr is a spy.
translation.ja: イングルマンダーは内通者だ

translation.en: He's working with Anlaf to ally British kings against you.
translation.ja: 敵のアンラフと協力している

translation.en: -Lies. -It is true. I saw him in Shetland.
translation.ja: うそだ この目で見た

translation.en: He told Anlaf's warriors to track me. They tried to turn me-- No! [grunts]
translation.ja: 彼がアンラフの兵士に指示し 俺の後を…

translation.en: -He is in Thelwael with your son! -He told them things of you.
translation.ja: 彼はテルウェールに 弱みもバラされた

translation.en: He still follows my gods.
For now, you have an advantage.
Ingilmundr does not know he has been discovered.
translation.ja: 彼はバレたことを知らない

translation.en: [Aethelstan] No, he would not betray me. If anything, I have betrayed him.
translation.ja: 彼は聖人だ 裏切ったのは私の方だ

translation.en: -No. -He is a man of God, and I am a sinner!
He has convinced you of this to provoke your campaign.
translation.ja: そう信じ込ませて 侵攻するよう仕向けた

translation.en: -To unite your enemies. -No!
translation.ja: そう信じ込ませて 侵攻するよう仕向けた うそだ

translation.en: Aethelstan, please see this. This alliance he has gathered is too large.
translation.ja: 信じてくれ 彼の集めた同盟は巨大だ

translation.en: -Your lands will be overrun. -No! You lie!
translation.ja: 征服される 信じない

translation.en: This is all lies!
Aethelstan, please hear me.
translation.ja: アゼルスタン　頼む

translation.en: Why would I lie to you?
-Get out. -Aethelstan--
Get out. Get from my sight! Guards!
-[door opens] -Take him!
[guard] You dog! On your way.
[Sihtric] We search every forest, every valley.
[Finan] And here he is, back in the lap of luxury.
We heard you needed us.
Truly the gods smiled at me to give me such friends.
translation.ja: 幸運にも 良き友に恵まれた

translation.en: [Finan] Let's find ourselves an alehouse, make a plan.
translation.ja: 飲みながら 計画を練ろう

translation.en: -Who told you I was here? -[Sihtric] She said you called for us.
translation.ja: なぜ ここに 伝言が来た

translation.en: -Did you not send for us, Lord? -She said you needed us.
translation.ja: 太守から 警護が要るから来いと

translation.en: And requested a guard.
translation.ja: 警護が要るから来いと

translation.en: Danish girl, serves in Aethelstan's court.
Finan, I sent no word.
No command for you to leave Bebbanburg.
translation.ja: ベバンバーグが手薄に

translation.en: -[Sihtric] Stay here and guard the gates. -[man] Yes, Lord.
[Uhtred] Wolf-Warriors.
[Uhtred] This is Anlaf's doing.
[Finan] Ingrith!
[Sihtric] Lord, where are they all?
-[Uhtred] Eadgifu? -Uhtred.
translation.ja: エドギフ 帰ったのね

translation.en: What happened?
[Eadgifu] When news reached us of the attack and torture here, the abbess sent us to help the injured.
translation.ja: この攻撃を知り 修道院が 負傷者を連れて行った

translation.en: But we cannot get to the injured.
Where… Where is she? Where's my wife?
"Seven kings must die," Lord.
"Seven kings
and the woman you love."
Ingrith!
-No. Ingrith! -Every man is to help move it.
translation.ja: イングリス！ 皆で動かせ

translation.en: You, up above.
-[Finan] Can anyone hear me? -[Uhtred] Watch for signs of Anlaf's men.
translation.ja: 聞こえるか？ 敵にも注意しろ

translation.en: We tried to help, but all we could do was comfort them.
translation.ja: 助け出そうとしたけど

translation.en: Uhtred, Ingrith said they threatened to return.
translation.ja: 戻ってくると脅されたそうよ

translation.en: -We must secure ourselves. -Not until we rescue those within.
translation.ja: 安全の確保を 中の者を助けてからだ

translation.en: When did you speak last?
About three days ago.
-[Finan] Get the rope up there! -[man grunts]
[Finan] Come on!
[Finan] Pull!
[Finan] Pull!
Pull!
Pull!
Now!
Finan.
Where is…
[in anguish] No!
[Uhtred] I brought this on them.
What they suffered is on Anlaf's account.
translation.ja: 彼らの死は アンラフのせい

translation.en: You cannot let this break you.
We are broken.
We have no allies. We're lost.
Then we must find the courage to defend Northumbria from their return.
translation.ja: 私たちで ノーサンブリアを守るの

translation.en: If we endure and keep them at siege,
translation.ja: ここに敵をとどめれば

translation.en: we will give those in other parts of England time to prepare.
translation.ja: その間に 他の国が準備できる

translation.en: Whatever we suffer protects those we are apart from.
translation.ja: 私たちの苦しみが 他の国を助ける

translation.en: [Sihtric] She's right, Lord.
Osbert can cross the Irish Sea, get to--
translation.ja: オズバートも海を越え…

translation.en: The Irish Sea?
We must find the fastest horses. I think Anlaf is hoping to turn all eyes here.
translation.ja: 速い馬が要る アンラフはここに注意を集め アゼルスタンをおびき寄せる

translation.en: To lure Aethelstan.
translation.ja: アンラフはここに注意を集め アゼルスタンをおびき寄せる

translation.en: But they will land where they have men. Ingilmundr holds a garrison in the Wirral.
translation.ja: だが 上陸は 軍隊があるウィラル半島だ

translation.en: With… With our sons.
[Osbert] Something's underway.
-[men shouting] -[Osbert] Get in the cart.
Those of you with swords to your throats face a decision.
translation.ja: 剣を突き付けられている者は 選べ

translation.en: A thousand ships are heading towards these shores.
Some have already landed.
Within a week, Saxon boroughs will be overrun.
translation.ja: １週間で サクソン人は征服される

translation.en: Join us and fight the tyrant Aethelstan,
translation.ja: 共にアゼルスタンと 戦うか——

translation.en: or die.
For King Ed--
-[Osbert] Keep still. -[man] This way!
We saw them, but they got away.
-There. Far away. -Thank you.
[woman] Yes, my lord.
[Sihtric] No word from Thelwael, Lord.
Sihtric.
Lord?
Do we finally face defeat?
All the warrior kings that I've known, Ubba, Cnut, Bloodhair,
translation.ja: アバもクヌートも シグードも結局——

translation.en: all have faced defeat in the end and have taken others with them.
translation.ja: 最後には負け 他の者を道連れにした

translation.en: The fight was always coming, Lord. No warrior dies a peaceful death.
translation.ja: 戦い続ける戦士に 平和な死はないのです

translation.en: She saw it all. "Seven kings must die."
translation.ja: 予言は “７人の王が死すべき”

translation.en: We have hope.
In your heart, you never wanted to be a king.
translation.ja: あなたは王位を望んでない

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Have those fleeing heard anything of my son?
translation.ja: 息子の安否は分かった？

translation.en: Then until I know for sure,
he is alive.
And if conquest is easy, perhaps Anlaf may be satisfied with Mercia.
translation.ja: アンラフは マーシャを 手に入れれば満足するかも

translation.en: -It is fertile-- -[Uhtred] He will not be satisfied.
translation.ja: アンラフは マーシャを 手に入れれば満足するかも 彼はやめない

translation.en: They come Viking now to extinguish an idea of England.
translation.ja: イングランドを消しに来る

translation.en: A dream unites a people who once sought to kill each other.
translation.ja: 争った者同士が団結する夢

translation.en: Without it, we go back into an age of darkness.
translation.ja: なくなれば暗黒時代に戻る

translation.en: We have both lost so much.
But I ask myself…
am I alive?
Can you feel it?
[Uhtred] You are alive.
So are you.
So we have hope.
[Uhtred] Edmund?
Osbert?
[Eadgifu] Edmund?
I came seeking Ingilmundr.
To prove that you had lied to me.
But you had not.
[Uhtred] We came to search for our sons.
Bring out Osbert and Edmund.
[Uhtred] Osbert!
[Aethelstan] They hid themselves and were spared the massacre.
translation.ja: 身を隠し虐殺を逃れた

translation.en: [Eadgifu] Lord King, you have my endless gratitude.
translation.ja: 陛下 心より感謝します

translation.en: [Aethelstan] I've not been myself this past year, and truly, truly, I…
translation.ja: 私は 自分を見失っていた

translation.en: I pay for my sins.
I face a great alliance at Brunanburh.
translation.ja: ブルナンブルで同盟と戦う

translation.en: All regret is worthless.
Let us speak only of the fight to come.
translation.ja: 目の前の戦いのことを

translation.en: -Osbert, what have you learnt? -They've set up camp on high ground.
translation.ja: 話してくれ 高地で野営してます

translation.en: And they have six armies.
Then seven armies shall meet at Brunanburh.
I do not want you to fight for me, Uhtred.
-[Uhtred] Trust I'm on your side-- -I know that.
translation.ja: 俺は味方… 知ってる

translation.en: Save yourself.
Take your son to safety.
If I do not survive the battle, then succession will be secure.
translation.ja: 私が戦いで死んでも 王位は継承される

translation.en: You cannot fight this alliance alone.
[Aethelstan] Yet I forbid you from taking part.
Take him, Father Pyrlig. Please, take them all.
translation.ja: ピヤリグ神父 みんなを頼む

translation.en: -I've dragged you all to this fate. -[Uhtred] Let us serve you.
translation.ja: 私の運命だ 王に仕える

translation.en: Aethelstan…
this is not a punishment.
I think we both know that it is.
[Uhtred] This is martyrdom.
He will not survive so great a number.
But we have been reprieved.
-God is telling us to get to safety. -Your god does not speak to me.
translation.ja: それが神のみ心よ 俺の神じゃない

translation.en: It is not cowardly to spurn a battle that cannot be won.
translation.ja: 負け戦をしないのは 臆病じゃない

translation.en: It is.
However this prevails, I will have to know I walked away from danger.
translation.ja: 僕は逃げた自分を責めます

translation.en: Your battles will come
when you become king.
King of where, Mother?
-We will fight with the shield wall. -No.
translation.ja: 楯の壁で戦う ダメよ

translation.en: -Osbert, are you ready? -I've always been ready.
Pyrlig, you once told me that it was my destiny to save England.
translation.ja: 俺はイングランドを 救う運命だと言ったな

translation.en: Hadn't seen it quite like this, but then I'm not one for prophecies.
translation.ja: この状況は予想外でしたがね

translation.en: [Eadgifu] What if your destiny is to protect Edmund?
translation.ja: エドマンドを守る運命かも

translation.en: Perhaps he is the one to unite England. He could be the king who was worthy.
translation.ja: 彼がイングランドを 統一する王かもしれない

translation.en: No king will form England.
This is what I see now.
Not Edmund or Edward or Alfred. Not even Aethelstan.
translation.ja: エドマンドにも アゼルスタンにも

translation.en: Alfred's dream was of a united people.
translation.ja: アルフレッドの夢のために

translation.en: And with these men, from all parts, I fought for it.
translation.ja: いろいろな国の男たちと 共に戦った

translation.en: What if our destiny was not to form England,
translation.ja: イングランドの 建国ではなく——

translation.en: but to form the English as one force?
translation.ja: イギリス人の統一が 運命だとしたら？

translation.en: Who better than a half Saxon, half Dane to lead men from divided places?
translation.ja: 国が異なる男たちの指揮は 太守が適任です

translation.en: [Uhtred] We go!
I don't have to call myself English, do I?
translation.ja: 俺はイギリス人じゃないが

translation.en: -[grunting] -[yelling]
translation.ja: ブロムボロー ウィラル半島

translation.en: To hear that, you'd think they'd won already.
translation.ja: もう勝ったような騒ぎだ

translation.en: [Uhtred] We should make our way. If this is to work, we need to be on the front line.
translation.ja: 成功させるには 前線にでなければ

translation.en: -We'll aim for their left side. -Why?
Why the left?
Weaker. Most men fight with the sword in their right hand.
translation.ja: 右利きが多いから 左が弱い

translation.en: I've fought with Uhtred many times. Trust he will find a way.
translation.ja: ウートレッドは 必ず方法を見つける

translation.en: You.
Where did you find that?
I bought it in Aegelesburg for five pieces.
translation.ja: エゲレスバーグで買いました

translation.en: May I?
I will exchange it for this one.
It is worth much more, and it has a garnet.
translation.ja: いい剣だし 宝石も付いてる

translation.en: When I say exchange, I mean you take that one, and I keep this one.
translation.ja: つまり 俺がこの剣をもらう

translation.en: [Uhtred] I am no commander of yours.
I have no authority other than being a man who has fought in many battles.
translation.ja: 戦いの経験が豊富なだけだ

translation.en: Some of you I have led before.
Today I stand with you as a simple soldier.
translation.ja: 俺は ただの兵士だ

translation.en: But I ask that, on the field, you once again let me guide you.
translation.ja: だが 戦場では 俺についてきてくれ

translation.en: Our position on the hill is weak,
but the trees to our left give us an advantage the enemy will not see.
translation.ja: だが 左の木を利用すれば 有利になる

translation.en: We can defeat them
if we stay united.
-This is one way to clear the ale. -Smell of a thousand armpits.
translation.ja: 酔いもさめるな 俺らの汗臭さで

translation.en: [Finan] Aye. Maybe they smelled us and ran away.
translation.ja: においで逃げ出したかな

translation.en: -[Sihtric] Maybe. -[Finan] Who touched my arse?
translation.ja: たぶん 尻に触るな

translation.en: Oh my God!
[soldier] Jesus!
Rather a lot of them, isn't there?
[Edmund] Uhtred?
-How do we face this? -You see these bags?
translation.ja: どう戦う？ あの袋を

translation.en: Give them to the men on the front line. Go.
[Uhtred] Do not raise your shield until you have to.
Stay at ease. Stay relaxed.
-And do not show them we are unsettled. -[Finan] Lord!
translation.ja: 不安を敵に見せるな 太守 来ました

translation.en: [Anlaf] Here he comes. The tyrant himself.
[Uhtred] Is it done?
-Get back as far as you can. -Yeah.
[commander] Shield wall!
-Are we ready, arselings? -[soldiers] Yeah!
I have taken their confessions.
When I ask you to give ground,
do it.
When you see the trees in front of you, it will be time.
translation.ja: 目の前に木が見えたら その時だ

translation.en: Do you think this will work?
If it does not, we will not be here to see it.
translation.ja: 失敗なら 結果を見れない

translation.en: Trust me.
And follow.
Shield wall!
Shield!
Wall!
Step back!
Back!
They retreat?
Even before we engage?
-Step back! -[Anlaf] They know they have lost already.
translation.ja: 下がれ！ 負けを認めたな

translation.en: Let's enjoy it.
-[commander] Forward! -[soldiers grunt]
I thank God, who I serve with pure conscience.
translation.ja: 親愛なる神に感謝します

translation.en: God hath not given us a spirit of fear, but of power…
translation.ja: 我らにたまわったのは 恐れではなく

translation.en: -[soldiers grunt] -…and of sound mind!
translation.ja: 力と愛 健全な心です

translation.en: [Finan] Amen.
[Uhtred] Step back!
Brace!
[commander] Re-form! Charge!
translation.ja: 体勢を整えろ！　突撃！

translation.en: Saxon bastards!
[Uhtred] Pyrlig!
No! [echoes]
Pyrlig!
-Two paces! One pace! -Mm-hmm.
-On my command! -[Finan] Let's hope this works!
translation.ja: ２歩　１歩　合図でだ やるしかない

translation.en: Two paces back!
Back!
Step back!
One pace back!
[Anlaf] They back off. We have them.
-Find the king! -[Anlaf] Find the king!
translation.ja: 王を見つけろ！ 王を！

translation.en: Step back!
[Sihtric] Go backwards!
For Shetland!
For Orkney!
Step back!
-Keep going! -Keep going!
[Finan] Back!
Protect the line! Protect the line!
Step back!
[Finan] They'll overrun us if we keep giving ground!
translation.ja: このままだとつぶされる

translation.en: What are they doing along the flank?
[Constantin] Send a message that Aethelstan is in front of us!
translation.ja: アゼルスタンが 目の前だと伝令を

translation.en: Step back!
Step back!
[Finan] The line's turning, Lord. We're coming around!
translation.ja: 前線が回っています 太守

translation.en: Aethelstan is on the Scots' line, Lord.
translation.ja: 敵の王がスコット人の前に

translation.en: Swine wedge!
Step back!
[Anlaf] Swine wedge!
[Constantin] Anlaf! Stop!
Push forward!
They're going for Aethelstan!
translation.ja: アゼルスタンが狙いだ

translation.en: Step back!
Back!
The wall will not hold!
[Uhtred] Aethelstan, hold the line!
translation.ja: アゼルスタン 耐えろ

translation.en: -[Finan] How much longer, Lord? -[Uhtred] We're almost there.
translation.ja: まだですか？ もうすぐだ

translation.en: They're breaking through Aethelstan's line, Lord!
[Finan] We can't hold!
Step back!
Push forward!
[Ingilmundr] Lord!
Lord.
[Hywel] Protect the king!
[Uhtred] Aethelstan!
[Finan] Lord, trees!
We've turned them, Lord! We've turned the line.
translation.ja: 方向を変えた　回したぞ

translation.en: -[Uhtred] Give the signal! -[runner] Yes, Lord.
-Something's not right. -[Domnal] We've been turned around!
translation.ja: 何か変だ 回された

translation.en: [runner] Make way! Make way!
Lord Uhtred orders the signal.
Attack!
Behind!
Hunt down their kings!
It's a trap!
[Shetland] My son!
No!
Guards!
Fall back! Fall back!
Scots! Fall back!
Aethelstan!
Pyrlig?
[Finan] Five kings escaped the field that day,
but their sons, Orkney, Man, Shetland,
translation.ja: だが その息子のオークニー マン シェトランド

translation.en: Strathclyde, and Scotland, did not.
translation.ja: ストラスクライド スコットランドは死んだ

translation.en: [Constantin] Each man here has left behind an heir.
translation.ja: ここにいる全員が 世継ぎを殺された

translation.en: We wait.
Then attack those leaving the field and return for our kin.
translation.ja: 立ち去るところを攻撃する

translation.en: [Shetland] Do not be any more foolish, Anlaf.
translation.ja: 愚かなことは やめろ

translation.en: [Anlaf] Shetland?
No more death.
[Anlaf] Orkney, we need to fight!
translation.ja: オークニー 戦おう

translation.en: What is there to fight for?
I need a ship to get back to Irland.
You?
[Sihtric] Lord!
[Finan] Uhtred!
Uhtred!
[Sihtric] Finan! Finan!
[Aethelstan] Was any of it real?
translation.ja: 「アングロサクソン 年代記」より すべてうそか？

translation.en: Tell me the truth.
When you find yourself before God, you will have confessed.
translation.ja: 神の前で すべて告白しろ

translation.en: I grew fond of you.
-But my love for my people prevailed. -I chose you over my people.
translation.ja: あなたに勝(まさ)った… 私は民より お前を選んだ

translation.en: Perhaps my gods are stronger than yours.
Then why am I living…
and you about to die?
Only fools try to understand destiny.
translation.ja: 愚か者には理解できない

translation.en: Uhtred.
Did my son survive?
Yes.
[Osbert] And Bebbanburg is ours again.
-We will rebuild in stone. -[Eadgifu] There is so much future.
translation.ja: 石で再建します 未来は明るい

translation.en: Stay with us, Uhtred.
-What of the enemy? -[Finan] The victory is ours.
Five sons of kings lay dead upon the battlefield.
translation.ja: ５人の王の息子が 戦いで死んだ

translation.en: -Five kings that will never be crowned. -[Finan] "Seven kings must die."
translation.ja: ５人の王が消えた ７人との予言は

translation.en: The prophecy was wrong, Lord.
With Edward of Wessex, it makes six.
translation.ja: エドワード王で６人になる

translation.en: Am I to be the seventh?
I have told the chroniclers to write of your victory, Uhtred.
translation.ja: あなたの勝利を史書に記す

translation.en: I have no wish to be written into your history.
translation.ja: 歴史に名を残す気はない

translation.en: I want only to be honored in the feast hall for standing by an oath.
translation.ja: 誓いを守り ヴァルハラに行きたいだけだ

translation.en: Uhtred, you did not just stand by me.
You stood for me.
You led where I could not.
And you forgave me
when I was unforgivable.
You saved the hope of England.
Now in time, it may yet happen.
I said that…
if you proved yourself to be the rightful king,
translation.ja: 王の資質を証明したら——

translation.en: I would swear Northumbria to you.
translation.ja: ノーサンブリアを渡すと

translation.en: Men have died fighting under the name of the English.
translation.ja: イングランドの名の下 大勢が戦い 死んだ

translation.en: To honor them, England should be formed.
translation.ja: 彼らのためにも統一を

translation.en: But I have one condition.
You must make an oath never to marry.
translation.ja: 絶対に結婚しないと誓え

translation.en: No heirs.
So your brother Edmund can take the throne unchallenged.
translation.ja: エドマンドの王座を守れ

translation.en: Thank you.
This oath I shall swear.
Then we submit to you as our king.
Which makes you ruler of Wessex, Mercia, East Anglia,
translation.ja: お前は ウェセックス イースト･アングリア マーシャ

translation.en: and Northumbria.
translation.ja: ノーサンブリアの統治者だ

translation.en: And I call my lands
England.
Long live the king!
[all] Long live the king.
[Uhtred] Long live the King of England.
translation.ja: イングランド国王 万歳

translation.en: Return to your chamber, Lord.
Do not grieve for me.
It was always written that I would fall in battle.
[Finan] You're not gonna die, Lord.
-I would go first, and I'm still alive… -[distant cheering]
translation.ja: 先に死ぬべき俺が まだ生きてる

translation.en: So,
destiny is all.
[Finan] Did seven kings die?
The chronicles do not record if my lord Uhtred survived.
translation.ja: ウートレッドの生死は 記されていない

translation.en: But those like me, who knew him,
translation.ja: だが 彼を知る者は

translation.en: recognize him as the greatest warrior of our age,
translation.ja: 彼は この時代の 最強の戦士で——

translation.en: and a man who made a kingdom.
translation.ja: 王国を作った男だと言う
